alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 5:46PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Cheyenne County in northwestern Kansas, southwestern Hitchcock and Dundy Counties in southwestern Nebraska through 515 PM MDT/615 PM CDT/... At 446 PM MDT/546 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles northwest of Benkelman, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Benkelman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Goodland. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM MDT/800 PM CDT/ for northwestern Kansas...and southwestern Nebraska.
